quest.name: Hearts of Precious Stone
journal:
The nearby Resistance camp has need of help, and Eshana has a mind to send you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Speak with the Resistance captain east of Virdjala.
Use the Resistance cannon to destroy dharas.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Forename, a requessst for help has come from the Resistance camp to the east. They ssseek to cull unruly dharas.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: These creatures feed on rock; if left unchecked, they are liable to cause avalanches, thus endangering travelers.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Pray make hassste to the camp and report to the Resistance captain. He will furnish you with further inssstructions.

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: Ah, you must be the adventurer they sent! You have our thanks.

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: As you will have heard, we seek to put down some uncommonly aggressive dharas. And to ensure that they stay down, we will strike their cores with cannon fire.

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: At the junction to the north, we've laid a hunk of precious ore which attracts dharas. The creatures will single-mindedly march towards it, thus exposing their vulnerable cores to the cannon we've positioned at the perch nearby.

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: Your task is to use the cannon to destroy the dharas before they can reach the ore. Go now, and good luck!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use the cannon to destroy the three dharas. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target the core and fire with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Do not let the dharas reach the ore, or the mission will end in failure.

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: The cannon is positioned at the perch just north of here. Hurry there and use it to destroy the dharas before they can reach the ore!

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: You did it! The dharas have all crumbled into the rock whence they came!

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: Our friends of the border guard hold you in high esteem, and small wonder. Thank you, adventurer, and please pass my regards to Eshana.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: So the dharas are no more? Excellent work, Forename. You have done all of us a great ssservice.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: That Resistance camp keeps watch over the route to the Peaks. Though our companies be different, we do not hesitate to cooperate with one another for the common good.

dialogue.name: LEADER03060
dialogue.text: My thanks again for your help with the dharas. Please pass my regards to Eshana.
